title: Mad Games Tycoon
notes: Crashes immediately. Sent error logs to developer like the crash report asked.

title: Mad Games Tycoon
notes: Values for screenresolution not visible. Scroll down for higher resolution. Game seems to run normal.

Screen resolution settings page has invisible labels, so had to select a lower blank label, confirm it and see what res was set to (managed to get 1920x1080 first time :-) ). Otherwise the game runs fine.
title: Mad Games Tycoon

notes: Game seems to work well. Crashed on initial startup but worked after. It seems as if a specific font is missing from the game which is used in menus such as the development room options and the text in menus such as genre or topic. I am sure this could be fixed by installing a font. Most text is visible in game. The screen resolution text being invisible is another example of the font not loading.
title: Mad Games Tycoon

gpu: ATI Technologies Inc. AMD Radeon R9 380
notes: The game runs okay, however there's a missing font for some parts. For a game that's heavily text based that makes it fairly unplayable. Installing corefonts on the prefix does that appear to solve the problem.
title: Mad Games Tycoon

notes: Runs perfectly with good performance - However, one font seems to be missing/is not shown. As this game heavily relies on that font (descriptions, names etc. of different options, employees...), the game is not really playable. I'm still giving it Bronze though as the buttons, while blank, work, and you still get most of the necessary information you need by pressing on them.
title: Mad Games Tycoon
